scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs   && tsc tools/build/bundle.d.ts src/app.ts     -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs      --sourcemap --sourceRoot src       --target ES5    -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers
scripts.watch_cjs: tsc tools/build/bundle.d.ts src/app.ts     -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs      --sourcemap --sourceRoot src       --target ES5    -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node -w
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6   && tsc tools/build/target-es6.d.ts src/app.ts -m es2015   --outDir dist/es6      --sourcemap --sourceRoot src       --target ES2015 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers
scripts.build_test: rm -rf spec-js   && tsc tools/build/test.d.ts test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir spec-js --target ES5 --diagnostics --pretty --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_e2e: rm -rf .tmp/e2e && tsc ./test/e2e/main.ts -m es2015 --outDir .tmp/e2e                                  --sourcemap --sourceRoot test/e2e  --target ES2015    --diagnostics --pretty                                                               --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node && ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.e2e.ts
scripts.build_socket: rm -rf dist/bundle/tbsdk.socket.js && tsc ./src/SocketApp.ts    -m commonjs --outDir dist/socket    --sourcemap --sourceRoot src       --target ES5    --diagnostics --pretty                                                               --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node && ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.socket.ts
scripts.watch_test: tsc tools/build/test.d.ts test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir spec-js                           --sourcemap --sourceRoot test       --target ES5      --diagnostics --pretty                                     --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --isolatedModules -w
scripts.build_mock: rm -rf dist/mock-es6 && tsc mock/index.ts                      -m es2015   --outDir dist/mock-es6 --sourcemap --sourceRoot mock      --target ES2015 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node && ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.mock.ts
scripts.build_mock_cjs: rm -rf dist/mock-cjs && tsc mock/index.ts  tools/build/bundle.d.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/mock-cjs --sourcemap --sourceRoot mock      --target ES5    -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_all: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/bundle && npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_bundle && npm run build_mock && npm run build_mock_cjs && npm run build_test && npm run build_e2e && npm run build_socket
scripts.publish_all: npm run build_all && npm publish && ts-node ./tools/tasks/publish.ts && cp ./dist/mock-cjs/** ./.tmp/mock && cp ./dist/socket/** ./.tmp/socket && npm publish .tmp/mock/ && npm publish .tmp/socket/
